61.58.text: The fact is we do deserve a great deal more pity than other people are ever very likely to bestow upon us.

67.68.text: Life is in truth horrendously hard in many ways.

71.64.text: Even if one does have a top notch data plan and an elegantly designed fridge.

89.04.text: So we have to supply a fair dose of it to ourselves.

187.00.text: In Catholicism for instance, the Virgin Mary is often presented as weeping out of tenderness for the miseries of the normal human life.

194.46.text: Such kindly divine beings are really just projections of our own need to be pitied.
